errors.error_description: The installation command `$ pip install asdf gwcs` installs `gwcs`, an unnecessary dependency for the core `asdf` package.
The command to run tests from an installed version of the package, `$ pytest asdf`, is incorrect. It is missing the `--pyargs` flag needed to correctly locate the package.
The commands for installing from source are in the wrong logical order. The `cd asdf` command is executed before the repository has been cloned with `git clone`, which will fail.
correction_candidates: Correct order is: `git clone ...`, then `cd asdf`, then `pip install .`
Correct order is: `pip install .`, then `git clone ...`, then `cd asdf`
The `cd asdf` command should be removed.
The `git clone` command should be `git clone https://github.com/asdf-format/asdf.git asdf`
errors.golden_answer: Correct order is: `git clone ...`, then `cd asdf`, then `pip install .`

The License section refers to a `LICENSE` file and a `license` folder, but the correct paths are `LICENSE.rst` and the `licenses` folder.

Change `LICENSE` to `LICENSE.md` and `the license folder` to `the licenses folder`.
